people: Parameter shows how well you feel among people
noize: Parameter shows how well you feel at noisy events
job: Parameter shows how satisfied you are with your work
sleep: Parameter shows how much sleep you need
activ: Parameter shows above attitude to active recreation
road: Parameter shows how well you feel when you go somewhere
multiwork: Parameter shows how many tasks you can perform at the same time
stress: The parameter shows how stressful you are
responsibility: The parameter shows how much you are responsible
plan: The parameter shows how the degree of planning of your life
motivation: Parameter shows how important motivation is for you
hobby: Parameter shows how much time you allocate for hobbies
